system.requirement: Your jaguar is strong and cunning.

abilities.description: Throat Clamp: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by directing your jaguar to strike from flanking and hold a foe (formidable or less) in place, add +1 and inflict 1 harm on a hit.

Stalker: When your jaguar stalks an unsuspecting foe, add +1 as you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray} +shadow. On a strong hit, also inflict 2 harm.

Brain Bite: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.aac3783710ad7499]{End the Fight} by having your jaguar deliver a killing blow to the skull of your foe (formidable or less), you may reroll any dice.
